name: UISpringLoadedInteraction
desc: An interaction object for configuring and controlling spring-loaded, user-driven navigation during a drag activity.

items.name: init(interactionBehavior: UISpringLoadedInteractionBehavior?, interactionEffect: UISpringLoadedInteractionEffect?, activationHandler: (UISpringLoadedInteraction, UISpringLoadedInteractionContext) -> Void)
items.desc: Initializes a new spring-loaded interaction with a specific behavior, visual effect, and activation handler block.

items.name: init(activationHandler: (UISpringLoadedInteraction, UISpringLoadedInteractionContext) -> Void)
items.desc: Initializes a new spring-loaded interaction with a specified activation handler block, employing the default behavior and visual effect.

items.name: var interactionBehavior: UISpringLoadedInteractionBehavior
items.desc: The behavior for the spring-loaded interaction.

items.name: var interactionEffect: UISpringLoadedInteractionEffect
items.desc: The visual effect for the spring-loaded interaction.
